ISSUE.TITLE: Error: mounting volume <XYZ> for container: <ABC>/_data: permission denied
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST? (leave only one on its own line)** /kind bug **Description** While attempting to use rootless podman-in-podman with a pre-existing volume, UID/GID of the host-directory is not set. I believe this is an intended use-case for the podman container image. A similar error is reproducible when using the image as root (though it does try to launch the container first). **Steps to reproduce the issue:** 1. `podman volume create -o uid=1000 -o gid=1000 testvol` *(options documented in the podman-volume-create man page)* 3. `podman run -it --rm --user=podman -v testvol:/home/podman/.local/share/containers quay.io/podman/stable podman info` 4. `cat /etc/subuid` 5. `ls -lan $(podman volume inspect -f json testvol | jq -r '.[].Mountpoint')` **Describe the results you received:** *note: my uid/gid on the host is 4179* ``` Error: mounting volume testvol for container 1ef...837: mount: /home/cevich/.local/.../testvol/_data: permission denied. ``` ``` cevich:100000:65536 ``` ``` total 0 drwxr-xr-x. 2 4179 4179 6 Nov 21 11:48 . drwx------. 3 4179 4179 19 Nov 21 11:48 .. ``` **Describe the results you expected:** ``` <podman info output> ``` ``` cevich:100000:65536 ``` ``` total 0 drwxr-xr-x. 2 1005179 1005179 6 Nov 21 11:48 . drwx------. 3 4179 4179 19 Nov 21 11:48 .. ``` **Additional information you deem important (e.g. issue happens only occasionally):** **Output of `podman version`:** ``` Client: Podman Engine Version: 4.3.1 API Version: 4.3.1 Go Version: go1.18.7 Built: Fri Nov 11 10:24:13 2022 OS/Arch: linux/amd64 ``` **Output of `podman info`:** ``` host: arch: amd64 buildahVersion: 1.28.0 cgroupControllers: -
